segments.text: I notice the woman so calmly drying that plate with her towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full, water cascading over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me worry she'll slip and hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching for cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is helping by waiting with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so innocent, but it's risky business.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting back, and my heart sinks thinking of a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene, a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the mom, missing all this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might be a small joy, but not worth the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This peaceful kitchen could turn tragic so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a drawing, but it tugs at my emotions.
segments.speaker: PAR
